LanguageData.OnlyOneBuildingAllowedPerMap: You may only place one {0} per map.
LanguageData.NoPowerToRecharge: Not recharging due to insufficient power
LanguageData.ChooseReward: Choose a reward from the Webway gate
LanguageData.PawnNotAeldariPsyker: Pawn is not an aeldari psyker and cannot navigate the webway
LanguageData.CannotResurrectMessage: An attempt was made to try and resurrect {0}, however their soul no longer with them and their body is an empty husk that cannot function without its soul.
LanguageData.CommandUsePortalDesc: Activating the Webway Gate will give you an option between 3 rewards to choose from. This procedure uses a lot of power.
